AND ar.article_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{articleTitle}, '%')
AND ar.article_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{articleContent}, '%')
AND u_created.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND ar.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
